title: Why am I not eligible for a refund on KaiSa ?
body: Never played kaisa, no pts, but still can't refund.. Bought her yesterday

replies.body: Do you have any refunds left? And if so, why waste them on BE?

No I have no refund, look @ these screenshots :

http://prnt.sc/nvpojv

http://prnt.sc/nvpoiv
You cant refund something if you used all your refunds.. You get 3 per account. They are meant to reverse accidental RP transactions, not demo stuff you dont want.
It clearly says that if you never played a champion you're able to refund it

The other commenter is asking if you have any refund tokens left. You get 3 on your account, and they give one per season now so you should have had 4 possible refunds total. Should say in the left side of the account purchases section.
Already used them all, but  normally, you can refund a champion within a week if you didn't used him. Which I didn't do.
